= Scheme =
Description of available Xattrs:
|| Letter || *Widget* || *DataType* ||
|| B || CheckBox || bool ||
||   || RadioButton || int + enum ||
|| L || List || enum ||
||   || Tree || ? ||
|| S || Lineedit || string ||
||   || TextEdit || html ||
||   || PlainTextEdit || text ||
|| I || SpinBox || int ||
|| F || DoubleSpinBox || float ||
|| D || Date || date ||
|| T || Time || time ||
||   || DateTime || datetime ||
||   || Image || image ||
|| X || Href || URL ||


Common attributes:
  * ID:string - uniq name and label
  * Mandatory:bool

Each widget can present 0 or 1 time.
Widget and data type encoded in 1st letter of xattr name.
